guild.description:
Hello, Based Department? Post based memes, videos, redpills and shitposts! Contains dark and offensive humor.

RULES: 
1. Read sticky before posting.
2. Follow Ruqqus ToS.
3. Don't be annoying and complain about the rules.

* Arras, Pas-de-Calais, France
* Houston, TX, USA
* Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan

body: Because he was a member of the *Federalist* party, the big-government party which was quite a lot like the Democrats (even though the narrative is that the Democrats came from the Anti-Federalists, that demonstrably makes absolutely no sense). Many of them wanted a literal monarchy, just separate from Britain.
body_html: Because he was a member of the Federalist party, the big-government party which was quite a lot like the Democrats (even though the narrative is that the Democrats came from the Anti-Federalists, that demonstrably makes absolutely no sense). Many of them wanted a literal monarchy, just separate from Britain.
